ul.li: NetworkAffliliation is a kind of ProviderAffiliation
PracticeAffiliation is a kind of ProviderAffiliation
HospitalAffiliation is a kind of ProviderAffiliation

section.title: Description
section.p: Represents information about the association between an Individual Healthcare Provider and an Organizational Healthcare Provider.

stentry.p: "Contains miscellaneous additional information related to the staff member's membership in the professional organization." - HL7 Version 2.8, AFF-5.
"Contains the period the staff member started and ended membership in the professional organization." - HL7 Version 2.8, AFF-4.
"The period during which the person is authorized to act as a practitioner in these role(s) for the organization." - HL7 FHIR, Practitioner.practitionerRole.period.
Pointer to the Organizational Provider with which the Individual Provider is associated.
"The organization where the Practitioner performs the roles associated." - HL7 FHIR, Practitioner.practitionerRole.managingOrganization.
Pointer to the Position that the Individual Provider holds at the Organizational Provider.
Pointer to the Priviledges and/or Responsibilities that the Individual Provider holds at the Organizational Provider.
